intro: This app helps you explore landmarks in Brielle. Here's how it works:
mapInstructions: - Open the Map menu to see where landmarks are located.
favoritesInstructions: - Tap on a landmark to add it to your favorites.
settingsInstructions: - In the Settings menu, you can change the theme of the app from light to dark and change the app's language.
enjoy: Enjoy exploring Brielle with Brielle Navigator 2024!
500: Oops something whent wront! please try again later.
400: Oops you entered something that could not be excepted! Check your entered values an try again.
permissionExplanation: This app requires location data to acuratly show your location on the mapp. please give the required permissions to use this app.
